__e: But it would be remiss of me if I didn't use this opportunity to reiterate that Sara is very important to me... to all of us.
I want to thank you, sir, for giving me the opportunity of serving here.
I really appreciate the opportunity to get up here and say a few words.
I really appreciate the opportunity to get up here and say a few words.
The reason I'm doing this isn't because I can't forgive you for what you did to me.
I say we move out now, while we got a window.
